reviews.author: Rachel Krout
reviews.text: Amber was such a big help getting me into my unit a few days early.  Very friendly and explained everything and answered all my questions and concerns.

reviews.author: Trea Sch
reviews.text: This storage facility is so clean and nice

reviews.author: Paul Francis
reviews.text: Went over and above to make sure I had a unit that would hold all my stuff. Gave me ample time to switch over from the unit I currently had to the new one. Couldn't be happier with a storage business.

reviews.author: Mark Rothermel
reviews.text: I've rented a lot of storage units at a lot of places and so far Storage Works has had the best prices and friendly people
